Text.Page: This liquor not only makes the Black Claw tribe more violent, it makes them stronger. I think the besharan merchants are using the Black Claw tribe orcans as weapons against the federation. Karba needs to know about this.

They drank some sort of liquor to give them power? They do not deserve to be called warriors! Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:41#3004#Black Claw crushers} and {@LinkCreature:41#3005#Black Claw ragers} and take their warrior tokens, so all the tribes will know how they let themselves be used as tools of the besharan merchants!
Death was too good for them. When I show the other tribes these tokens and tell them of the Black Claw tribe's shame, they will know the truth of it.
The Black Claw tribe do not deserve to wear the tokens of warriors. Help me to shame them in the eyes of all orcans.
